title: Elon Musk Attacks Apple, Tim Cook Over Advertising and Censorship; Twitter boss says tech giant is threatening the social-media company's presence in the App Store
text:
"Who else has Apple censored?" he asked in a tweet.

Twitter has been facing a wave of departures by advertisers since Mr. Musk bought the company last month. After initially pausing spending on the platform, many have begun shifting their digital ad spending to other corners of the internet, such as ByteDance Ltd.'s TikTok, Alphabet Inc.'s Google and Meta Platforms Inc.'s Instagram, The Wall Street Journal previously reported.

â€”Updates to follow as news develops.

Write to Sarah E. Needleman at Sarah.Needleman@wsj.com

Elon Musk Attacks Apple, Tim Cook Over Advertising and Censorship
